description:
We've heard rumors of a creature lurking deep in the arctic snow.  Dot thinks this is just an old legend and wants to go exploring anyway.  
Yeti or not, here we come!

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Oh, what's over here" when the top button is pressed.

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Oh, what's over here," make Dot automatically play a crocodile sound. Then make Dot wait for 1.5 s and turn on yellow lights.
puzzles.introduction: We don't know what a Yeti really sounds like so we're going to use a crocodile sound!

hints.description: Link the sounds together using an Auto cue. Link the Yellow light with a Wait For cue set to 1.5 s.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot instantly say "Hide me!" Then make Dot automatically play another crocodile sound.

hints.description: Link the Yellow light to the "Hide me!" sound using an Instant cue. Link the "Hide me!" sound to the Crocodile sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the last crocodile sound, make Dot wait for 2.5 s then turn on red lights. Then make Dot automatically play the Dizzy #1 sound and instantly return to Start.
puzzles.introduction: If Dot doesn't hide quickly, the Yeti will attack!

hints.description: Link the Crocodile sound to the Red light using a Wait For cue set to 2.5 s. Link the Red light to the Dizzy #1 sound using an Auto cue. Link the Dizzy #1 sound to Start using an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After the last crocodile sound, make Dot say "Face Plant!" when tilted face down. Then make Dot automatically turn the lights off.
puzzles.introduction: When the yeti growls, Dot needs to hide! Dot must lie Face Down to be hidden from the Yeti.

hints.description: Link the Crocodile sound to the "Face Plant!" sound using a Face Down cue. Link the "Face Plant!" sound to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dot wait for 2.0 s then turn on white lights. Then make Dot automatically say "Little help?"

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the White light using a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s. Link the White light to the "Little help?" sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Little help?" make Dot say "Whoa, where am I?" when Dot is tilted upright. Then make Dot automatically say "Oh, what's over here."
puzzles.introduction: After hiding from the Yeti, Dot wants to keep exploring!

hints.description: Link the "Little help?" sound to the "Whoa, where am I?" sound using an Upright cue. Link the "Whoa, where am I?" sound to the "Oh, what's over here" sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: When the Yeti growls, try to hide Dot. Roll Dot on the floor and try to make Dot stop face down to hide from the Yeti. Help Dot hide from the Yeti three times.
puzzles.introduction: So far so good.  Let's see how long we can avoid this Yeti without being chomped!
